com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.basis

Class Scheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.smarthome.emulator.simulations.basis.Scheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Scheduler
extends java.lang.Thread
    Takes messages stored in Adapter instance and sends them to server. Extends Thread

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Ancestor class Thread implementation. Runs until terminate is set to true. If there is no internet connection or server is unreachable, thread sleeps for SLEEP_INTERVAL before trying to send message. If there are no messages to send, thread is put to wait.

        Shows errors:

        • SCHEDULER_SLEEP if failed to put thread to sleep
        • SCHEDULER_WAIT if failed to put thread to wait

        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • setServerParameters

        public void setServerParameters(ServerPanel panel,
                       java.lang.String givenName,
                       java.lang.String givenIp,
                       int givenPort)
        Creates Server instance from given parameters
        Parameters:
        panel - server GUI panel,not null
        givenName - server hostname, null if givenIp is not null
        givenIp - server ip, null if givenName is not null
        givenPort - server port, not null

      • startProcessing

        public void startProcessing()
        Sets process indicator to start and notifies thread if it is waiting
